content:
Craft an item of type: detector_rail
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 14, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 37, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 54, "index": 37}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft the detector rail, I need to get redstone. Redstone can be crafted from a redstone block which I have in my inventory at slot 39. Therefore I will move the redstone block into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: detector_rail
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 14, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 37, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 54, "index": 37}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]
thought: I have now crafted the redstone, so I need to move it from the crafting grid into an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: detector_rail
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 14, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 37, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 54, "index": 37}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a detector_rail, I need to first craft 3 stone and then 1 stone_pressure_plate. In order to do so, I must smelt 3 cobblestone. The first cobblestone is located at slot 18 and I will smelt it into the first empty slot (12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 18 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: detector_rail

Ok
act: smelt from slot 18 to slot 13 with quantity 1

Ok
